com.tyrlib2.graphics.scene

Interface ISceneQuery

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CollisionQuery, RenderSceneQuery

    public interface ISceneQuery
    An interface for performing scene queries to a spatial hierachy
    Author:
    Sascha

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      void callback(BoundedSceneObject sceneObject)
      If the object fullfills the query condition use this callback to work on the actual object
